summary: Adds Light Blades Armor to the game and fixes some issues with Heavy Blades Armor.
descriptionHtml:
ENHANCED BLADES ARMOR
Skyrim Mod

Ver 1.0  (7/14/2012)
by: Darius2301

[b][u]Description:[/u][/b]
This mod adds a light version of the Blades Armor to the game and fixes some issues with the standard (heavy) Blades Armor.

[b][u]Blades Armor:[/u][/b]
* Matching Set Perk now works correctly.
* Fists of steel perk works correctly.
* Type is set to \"Steel\" armor, will be fully upgradeable by a smith with the \"Steel Smithing\" perk.

[b][u]Light Blades Armor:[/u][/b]
* Can be found in the same chest as the Blades armor, in Sky Haven Temple.
* Same stats as glass armor.
* Fully upgradeable and enchantable.
* Type is set to \"Scaled\" armor, will be fully upgradeable by a smith with the \"Advanced Armors\" perk.
* All Light Armor perks should work correctly.

[b][u]Manual Installation:[/u][/b]
Copy the file BladesArmorEnhanced.esp to your Skyrim \"Data\" directory.  Normally, this can be found here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

[b][u]Q & A:[/u][/b]
Q: How can I report a bug?
A: Please enter a comment on Skyrim Nexus.
author: Darius2301
